website_summaries.verdict: An unobtrusive floor lamp with a convenient dimmer switch, adjustable positioning, and appealing LEDs.
pros: Provides 360 degrees of adjustable, sturdy lighting
Great for reading and hobby work
cons: Red power cord detracts from minimalist aesthetic

website_summaries.verdict: A highly functional and versatile LED lamp that serves multiple purposes. Excellent quality construction.
pros: Features an adjustable neck with a strong and sturdy base
Allows you to set your desired brightness with dimmer mode
We love that it retains its previous setting after being switched off
cons: A small number of users report the lamp died after not much use

customer_reviews.title: Everything works great but don't be too quick to write a review
customer_reviews.text: This is the result 2 years after purchase. After I press the power button it starts flickering rather than turn on. I thought there would be a lamp inside than I can replace, so I opened the lid. I see that the whole thing is hardwired so the only option is to throw it away. Forget 3 year warranty. After one week of lame back and forth the seller/manufacturer wants to send me a power adapter. This is clearly a defective item. New power adapter won't fix the broken LED. Wait a while before publishing your reviews, give the product some time to prove itself.
customer_reviews.author: journeyman

customer_reviews.title: short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: The light died after 5 months use, which is a problem because from what I gather from other reviews, it is not replaceable. Their customer service is extremely slow. At this point it's not clear to me they're even going to honor the supposed warranty. This review may change in the future if they provide any semblance of service, but until then, my recommendation is to stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Bright Idea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light for my business!! And I love it!! Very easy to assemble and great lighting for my purpose..
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: lamp does not light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these lamps. The switch didn't work right on either of them, and now the one lamp has quit completely. i have tried to contact Brightech three times and have not received a response. Update 1/05/18: Still no satisfaction from Brightech, though I do receive e-mails saying they usually respond to inquiries within 24 hours. (It's been six or seven days.)
customer_reviews.author: Discriminating Reader

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this lamp, but after I put it all together, I tried to turn the light on. The switch was stuck, and was impossible to get the lame to come on. I am forced to send it back. I don't know if I want to try my luck with a second one. This lamp was defective right out of the box. It never worked. I was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good Lamp Greater After Sales Service
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this lamp in Nov 2017, it was working great until it died a week ago. Not sure why because I don't use it long and always turned it off when done using. After a few emails with customer service Brea, she suspected it's static. Since my purchase is still within 3-year warranty, Brightech sent me a brand new lamp. I'm now happily using the new lamp, thanks to Brightech.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Y

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this light to read in fact I see no useful purpose for it
customer_reviews.text: I am a lighting expert. I can tell you that the color of this light is between 5000-7500 degrees Kelvin which means it is extremely harsh on the eyes. The optimum color should be 2700-3000. Apparently the people who designed this light know nothing about the color spectrum. I would not buy this light to read in fact I see no useful purpose for it. If you read under this light you will most likely get a headache from eye strain. I will be replacing mine immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: trash top to bottom
customer_reviews.text: They used the absolute minimum amount of the most garbage metal they could find to build the shell of this utterly worthless piece of trash. The threads that fail miserably at holding this product together seem to come prestripped on both the male and female sides so you can't move or turn it without it falling apart. The switch won't remember being on so if you put it on a light switch or remote controlled outlet to attempt to avoid bumping it(which promptly causes it to fall apart) while turning it on or off it defaults back to off so you have to turn it on again at the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Imez Ruez

customer_reviews.title: so good. I wanted a light to use while I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the light for one week but so far, so good. I wanted a light to use while I cross stitch and I am amazed that I can now see the difference in the subtle shades of thread and can work on my project so much longer with no eye fatigue. The lamp seems to be of good quality and the price was very reasonable. I was impressed with the dimming feature which was not available on other lamps of comparable price and the fact that I received it very quickly after ordering. The only thing keeping me from giving five stars is the fact that I haven't used it very long yet.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Company doesn't respond to issues
customer_reviews.text: Lamp quit working after 4 months. I contacted the seller and their site says it has a 3 year warranty but they have not made contact back with me to rectify the problem. Very disappointed that this has happened as my mother in law loved it to do her stitch work with. I looked at reviews before I purchased and am wondering if they have paid people to review the product. Wish I had purchased elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R Penrod

customer_reviews.title: Cannot replace bulbs. Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: What they don’t tell you is that the led lights themselves are not replaceable. So it’s basically DESIGNED to be a DISPOSABLE floor lamp. It is also impossible to turn off the “night light” without unplugging it. I wish THAT part would burn out as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Strobe light!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this less than 2 years and it was just ok until it apparently has a wiring problem and is now a strobe light flashing off and on. Since we have only used this over a puzzle table and never moved or repositioned it, this wiring problem should not have happened. The lamp is no longer usable and is possibly dangerous to turn on so it's already time for a new one but a different and hopefully better quality lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Rivka

customer_reviews.title: I Like the White Light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light for my favorite reading spot on my sofa. It was easy enough to put together following the instructions. When I turned it on I was surprised that the light was a whitish light, unlike the yellowish light from my previous reading lamp. And I found that I really like the quality of light because I read a lot. The one thing I'm not that pleased with is that the pole is a little wobbly. And I'm pretty sure I put it together correctly. So I'm giving it a 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: sfbeast

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: 2 years later it just blinks. It was the power supply
customer_reviews.text: Update: I bought this lamp in 2015. It ran OK for about a year. Then it became reluctant to turn on. Now when I can get it on, it just blinks. It was the power supply. I plugged a different power supply in and it works great
customer_reviews.author: John R. Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Know the type of light that you prefer
customer_reviews.text: This is a quite satisfactory bright light for close up work or for those with reading disabilities due to vision limitations. I did not check the type of lighting before ordering: incandescent, florescent, halogen. This lamp is bright, white. I realize that I prefer a daylight type light to the bright white of this lamp. This is a matter of preference, not a problem with the light. You need to know and choose from the options. . I would have preferred a lower stand post. For me, average sitting height, the goose neck begins about 6" higher than another lamp that I have. Check that measurement for your needs. I can still use and like the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable the brilliant light that comes from this 12 watt bulb.
customer_reviews.author: John Vault

customer_reviews.title: I put floor lamp together alone and job went fine until connecting the 4-pole unit into the base
customer_reviews.text: I put floor lamp together alone and job went fine until connecting the 4-pole unit into the base. Instructions say not to twist the wires but in order to screw the poles unit into the base, buyer has to kept base steady and screw the entire pole unit round and round and round and round. Those two wires have to be entangled as a result!!! Also---the cord is too short compared to other similar lamps and the cord is not close to thick enough. My attraction to this lamp was the LED. I feel certain the lamp won't last because of the construction. Lamp is working right now so atleast that is good.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Great crafting and reading light!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item as my first one died after a few years. So, the claim to a 20 year lifespan is questionable. But, I do really like this light so was willing to give it another try. The downside is that you cannot just change the bulb when it goes out and that seems pretty wasteful to me. So, if this one only lasts a few years, I will be looking for one that you can replace the bulb when it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Li'l Bee

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these lamps and 2 of them have caused a static discharge that fried them so they stopped working. The one that works I like a lot which makes me so disappointed because they have potential to be a nice lamp to study by. Just save your self money and keep looking so you don't end up wasting money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: SlayrWanab

customer_reviews.title: Loose fitting at base
customer_reviews.text: The light is great! All the joints went together just fine. But the bottom joint that fits intro the base is quite lose. If you will contact me about this problem I will adjust the rating upward, but not until you tell me what to do about this lose fitting base connection. Ed
customer_reviews.author: Edwin K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, cheap looking with wobbly base. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed with this lamp. It is not easy to put together even though the instructions seem straightforward. I spent more than an hour trying to screw the tubes together. I tried all possible combinations without success. One tube would not thread all the way into the other tube so I was not able to screw 2 of the tubes tightly. The base is not stable at all. It wobbles..Ther wood color looks cheap. All in all this is a flimsy product. I intend to return it if I can manage to unscrew the tubes. I do not recommend buy this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jana L.Perskie

customer_reviews.title: Well, I loved this lamp, but......
customer_reviews.text: it stopped working today, April 18. I purchased it on February 10 of this year, so I got just over two months of use, really less because I don't sew every day. What do I do now? Purchase another lamp? I'm so disappointed. I would have given this five stars if it had lasted at least a year or more. Now, I'm stuck with no sewing lamp. I emailed the seller, so we will see what happens. Anyone with any ideas, please feel free to comment.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGirl

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was great until it stopped working which seems to be a common thread on here... they claim it should last 20 years but mine didnt even last one year... very disappointed in this product... If I could give ZERO stars I would. I can't even get a response from the company let alone amazon. I feel like something is wrong here and needs to be addressed. Has anyone else gotten the same feedback I have gotten? Also, I have had this lamp for a year but really have only used it for a short period of time. It is only used for small projects, not on all the time like a normal lamp is used.
customer_reviews.author: donna james

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. The contemporary sleek design is very cool. The first one came without parts, the second one very good! Excellent daylight LED bulb so gives a white light, even better a dimmer. Do not believe it is 72 inches as someone stated. With light tilted straight up it measures 63 inch. The neck can be adjusted to many different angles, made out of plastic like a vacuum cleaner hose.
customer_reviews.author: Christene

customer_reviews.title: Sleek lines for a modern Led Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'm slightly disappointed that this is not the same as the one I ordered just 3 weeks earlier. It has a thicker goose neck and a different base. I wanted it to match the one i had purchased just 3 weeks earlier as they are in the same room. I use one for reading and the other at my Long Arm Quilting machine. I may order one more for at the other end of the 5' frame, but wonder which version I will receive. Both lamps seem to have the same brightness and features, which I particularly like.. My space is not huge, so I like the minimalist look of these lamps.
customer_reviews.author: A Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Good bright light.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who has macular degeneration and needs a good bright light to help him see print. This lamp provides that for him. It was very easy to assemble and, so far, it seems very stable. I bought this lamp to replace one that kept falling over when my husband tried to move it for better viewing. This lamp is nice looking and affordable. I’m very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Kiz

customer_reviews.title: a great reading light.
customer_reviews.text: The light arrived in 2 days it is all it was said to be and a lot more the light is very easy to adjust the brightness. It is very stable and holds the light adjustment. If you want a great reading floor lamp this is the one to get its perfect right out of the box. My in-laws have a different kind of floor lamp. I like this one a lot better than theirs, because on theirs it has a rotary switch. On this one it has a push button that's lighted and when you turn it on it is still on your setting till you change it.
customer_reviews.author: david arnold

customer_reviews.title: Terrible base to pole connection gets loose and fails on 5 lamps i bought
customer_reviews.text: This looked like the LED lamp ive been wanting for a long time. I bought one and it worked out good so i bought 5 more for several rooms. Then as i adjusted the goose neck and moved lamps around the base got loose. I would screw it back tight and then it would get loose again and flop over. Eventually the base connector piece stripped the threads out and now i have 5 lamps that wont stand up right. I guess I can weld or glue the bases so they wont come apart. Would be okay if you dont touch it or move it ever. The connection sleeve from pole to base is just hokey and badly designed.
customer_reviews.author: J. James

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was easy to assemble and looks fine. I don't like that it doesn't work as advertised or instructed. Touch the switch 8 or 10 times and it finally goes on: VERY bright. Press once more to dim and it goes OUT! Worse, while it's on it creates static in my music system. And no, I did not mess up the electrical cord during assembly. I heeded your warning to be very careful. Perhaps the manufacturer is the one not careful enough. I'm very disappointed and will send it back as soon as I muster the energy to take it apart again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafting or reading! It's dimmable, but doesn't bend down as far as it looks like it will.
customer_reviews.text: This light works great for crafting when the ambient lighting in the room just isn't enough to see what you are doing clearly. I like that it's dimmable. You have to hold the light button in and the light changes brightness. That wasn't entirely clear, but we figured it out. I wish the height was more adjustable. The goose neck only bends so far down, about halfway, even though it looks like it will bend further. It's not perfect, but it's great for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Light for Small Corner
customer_reviews.text: I bought another similar Brightech lamp, the LED 2-in-1 Edition, which I prefer for its easy-to-manipulate on/off/dimmer button. I also like this light because it fits in a corner next to a bed or desk, is adjustable and dimmable (though I don't think it's as easy to manipulate as advertised). The price is great! The threading on the pole pieces was a bit rough, but I managed to put them together. There is a small screw which requires a very small Phillips screwdriver. Overall, I am happy with this light. One suggestion -- I dislike the pebbly Styrofoam packing that crumbles into tiny non-biodegrable Styrofoam pellets. Please find more environmentally friendly packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Library Lady

customer_reviews.title: Bad product and not reliable
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! Don't know how product is getting such high ratings! Next to impossible to get lamp to operate properly AND consistently. Out of sheer frustration, returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Earl T

customer_reviews.title: The first one I received had an annoying hum when the light was on
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received had an annoying hum when the light was on. I emailed Brightech about the problem. I received an immediate response from them. They suggested I contact Amazon for a replacement which I did. No problems with Amazon as usual. Received the identical light in 2 days. It's been 2 weeks now and light works as advertized. No hums.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: This is a great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright, and full-spectrum light, which is very nice for doing craft work. My wife bought it for knitting and crocheting, and has been very pleased with the bright and evenly disbursed light it produces. There are no hot spots with this light, just an even wash of light over the work area. A nice feature is that it has a built-in dimmer for those times you don't need the full brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this light.
customer_reviews.text: Product description said the LED light never has to be replaced because it is integrated into the fixture and expected to last OVER 20 years. I bought this lamp in February 2, 2016 it is now June 19, 2016 and it started flickering and became very dim. It cannot be returned. I won't buy another Brightech product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Apr. 2016 - Dec. 2019
customer_reviews.text: It has been working for three and a half years. Now, it keeps blinking. I think it is gone. At the same period, I bought several light fixtures for my new house. This lamp is the first one to be dead among the others, so far. I think the LED panel is ok, but the control unit is wrong. Because it has worked for 3 1/2 years, I give two stars.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.

customer_reviews.title: A Hassle in turning on!
customer_reviews.text: A disappointment in turning it on, both my spouse and I. We press switch on and nothing. We hold switch on and wait for light to work. After some minutes pass it may flicker and light bright or go dim or go out. After some time it lights and often leave it on longer than we desire, afraid to turn it off since turning it back on is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Schnauzerbark

customer_reviews.title: Nice light!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an older lamp that still works but came apart. It looks exactly like the old one but has adjustable brightness instead of just an on/off switch. It has a movable accordian neck that can be moved in whatever direction you want & seems very stable. It's a floor lamp but doesn't have a large footprint so very space friendly & easily perches over the shoulder for reading, and can be dimmed so doesn't interfere with the TV screen. It was extremely easy to assemble. The black looks sleek and would match many decors.
customer_reviews.author: BOB GAUTREAUX

customer_reviews.title: Saved me hundreds of dollars
customer_reviews.text: Was going to have a contractor install a new back yard light to lighten the way for my dog and me. Hundreds of dollars, plasterer, electrician, mess. Forget about it! Then my brilliant wife came up with idea of positioning a light from inside, out the back window to accomplish the same job. Decided on this lamp, and it illuminates the backyard better than I had hoped, even better than neighbors with outdoor lights. Saved me a bundle, and can be used for so many indoor illumination purposes. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: hlb

customer_reviews.title: Be Clear- This is a Reading Lamp designed as a Floor Lamp.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a floop lamp, this is not it. It is a quality reading lamp that has the height of a floor lamp. It will not light up an entire room as much as the cheaper walmart floor lamp with the Bowl Shaped Cover, but is great for reading directly under the light. So be clear about what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Objectivo

customer_reviews.title: Balances the light
customer_reviews.text: My small studio had regular light bulbs that cast a yellow-ish tint -- it took me over a year to realize this! This lamp from Brightech really helps. You can find wonderful 6500K CFL lightbulbs, but then you've got to figure out how to position them without creating stumbling blocks (like tripods, etc.) around your painting area. This light stands by itself, is easily positionable, and has several dimming settings. My only criticism is that I wish it had one more setting a bit brighter than the brightest. Overall though, this is a lovely, simple, elegant solution.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value - Dimmer Fails - Constant Flashing
customer_reviews.text: I've had three of these over three years. One replaced under warranty. No parts available. Customer service is frustrating at best. I use them to light my canvas and paints when painting. I love them when they work properly. However, all three have failed. The brightness is controlled by a single button. However, after some use, they get frustratingly difficult to control, and then finally fail with constant blinking. What good is it to buy a LED lamp if the controls fail faster than the LEDs.
customer_reviews.author: FotoMike

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased one Brightech Litespan for my home office. It performed so well that I purchased another one. Both units arrived quickly, two days after I purchased them. Both were well packaged and assembly was easy. The lamps are stable, with little risk of tipping over. The lamps provide a tremendous amount of natural light around my desk and have greatly reduced the strain on my eyes as I work on my laptop. The units are well built. These lamps are one of my best Amazon purchases ever. Very satisfied, so far. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: great light for reading
customer_reviews.text: I added this light near my chair to improve lighting for reading and it is wonderful. The only thing I'm not crazy about is the button light staying on all the time but the color is not too disturbing when trying to sleep in the living room. I'm thinking about getting a second one to go on the other side of my chair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have the patience to attach the base
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was a bear to assemble. Not because it was complicated, but because for one person it was very difficult to attach the pole to the base. After several attempts, I was able to approximate a straight lamp, but it still is not as stable as I would like it so would not want to move it except by lifting the base. I have placed it close to the wall where I hope it will not be bumped and wrecked. The light is bright and easy to read by, but I was surprised that the on/off switch remains lit all the time. I have been reading by a small Ottlite so this is a step up in improving visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Spike's mom

customer_reviews.title: Replace Not Repair
customer_reviews.text: We have had this lamp for almost 3 years and it works quite well. Provides adequate light for reading so that overhead lights do not need to be turned on. I really enjoy the dimmable feature because I was getting ready to replace the lamp until I read Amazon's FAQ section and found out how to brighten it. We have friends who have very expensive cars with 3 pointed stars that say very few repairs are made, just replacements. Have read the reviews expressing frustration with the inability to repair the lamp. Perhaps that is the world in which we now live?
customer_reviews.author: inland sailor

customer_reviews.title: The ability to dim is nice but it's not what I expected or wanted
customer_reviews.text: STRIPES! This light leaves little lines due to the shape of the bulb and it definitely does not have a natural light cast. The ability to dim is nice but it's not what I expected or wanted, the lines are so distracting when you are trying to work on small projects.
customer_reviews.author: A. C

customer_reviews.title: Dimmable; fits in small space
customer_reviews.text: I like that the light is dimmable, that the lamp is small (to fit the space I have available), that the switch is on the lamp (I don't want a switch on a dangling cord or on the floor) and lit, and that the cord comes out the base of the lamp. I bought one to have next to my recliner so I have enough light to knit while "watching" television. I bought a second one for my office to use to better see books I take down from my bookcase. The goose neck part is short (not quite 14 inches) and the first approximately 7 1/2 inches are fixed, but it bends enough for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Micawber

customer_reviews.title: Brightech LED reading and craft light
customer_reviews.text: This light is attractive, was extremely easy to assemble and is everything it promised to be. I needed a light that would be bright enough for me to see my wool applique during the evening hours while I watched tv and sewed. This light is just what I needed. It has several light settings which have come in handier than I thought. It is attractive and sturdy with a heavy base which gives the light great stability. I am very happy with this light and would recommend it to others needing good illumination for whatever their needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The design is good. Very easy to assemble. Note that the tubing with the hole near one end is the bottom tubing. The only down side is that the lighted on/off switch is a to bright for a bedroom reading lamp, but it makes a great night light. We moved our lamp to the den where it serves well at the computer. The current dimmer setting is remembered the next time the lamp is turned on. The light is plenty bright enough, and we like the white, daylight, color.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Skelton

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Bedside or Office Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is convenient to use, attractive and solid. I like the variable brightness (hold the on/off button and it cycles brighter then dimmer, etc.) and I LOVE the fact that the on/off button is illuminated and makes an excellent night light. Only negative is coolness of light - I would like warmer light - but that cool LED light gives you COOLNESS (you never have to worry about burning your hand if you touch it) and ENERGY EFFICIENCY! A well-designed lamp at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Nistico

customer_reviews.title: Good Value-Works Exactly As I Expected Except For One Small Problem.....
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this floor lamp except that , as others have noted, there's an orange light that glows at night which defines the on-off button- that glow is always on.....the lamp was delivered in a timely manner and was relatively easy to assemble. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5, is because of the dim glow of the on-off button.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Best LED lamp ever
customer_reviews.text: I had brought a Brightech Lifespan lamp for my husband and he loved it. There was easy assemble and even with the light right over his shoulder there wasn’t any heat coming from the bulb. There wasn’t any place on this lamp that a child could get burned. Well, the bulb stopped working and Hubby wanted his replacement and he wanted it NOW. I can truthfully say this is the perfect lamp for our family. I received my new lamp in two days. I would recommend this lamp to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: Eyvonne Fawcett

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp; Nice Company
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was delivered very quickly, in good shape due to excellent packing. Instructions were clear after a second cup of coffee, and it went together without a hitch. It fit the bill quite well, providing variable hue and brightness on command to a 5,000 piece jigsaw puzzle under construction. It is really a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: F W Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Failed to last more than 7 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, initially it performed as advertised. The problem came this morning when I needed to light up my remote so that I could see which button to push. I reached up and pushed the button on the lamp and nothing happened. The only thing lighted was the control button. So while there was voltage to the unit, the lamp failed to light up. As this was purchased on Sept. 13th, 2019, it was not as reliable as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Wily Coyote

customer_reviews.title: The light is excellent, particularly for doing counted cross-stitch
customer_reviews.text: The light is excellent, particularly for doing counted cross-stitch. I had problems screwing the middle section of the pole into the upper section. I never got it all the way in. There seems to be some sort of burr in between one of the grooves. But I was more interested in the light than the way it looked, so just set it up by my chair and started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Tittle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible welding job, and it passed QA. Sad.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t able to even use it. I put my faith in a previously purchased lamp. Now, I see why it was returned. Extremely disappointed on why the company would resell the lamp without fixing it. End threaded piece of one the threaded poles is welded on crooked. There’s no way on Earth anyone can screw the poles together without having a “Leaning Tower Of LED” as the end result. I will update my displeasure once I receive a lamp that is easy to put together and, above all, works. PS - Again, no, I did CAREFULLY screw the pole pieces together. The threaded end on one was welded on at an angle. I see why the previous customer returned it.
customer_reviews.author: dieseld725

customer_reviews.title: a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this lamp a lot. There is a little button that lights up that lets me know that it is plugged in when not turned on. I tend to unplug things when not using (it is amazing how much my electric bill has gone down since I started doing this), so that is a help. It is LED so very bright and is great for reading. It is flexible so I can make it go up and down and it takes up practically no room-footprint wise. And I thought the price was reasonable - when this type of lamp first came out they were twice as expensive.
customer_reviews.author: runnerjud

customer_reviews.title: Ordered March 2017 and it was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I have had this light now for shortly over 1 1/2 years and it worked great until I noticed here recently that it is getting really dim. I use this light excessively, it is left on for 8 hours a day Monday-Friday so I am not that surprised that it didn't last the 10-15 years as it claims (lol). I was a little upset when I went to purchase another bulb only to realize that it's LED and can't be replaced. It really is a great light, I don't think I will repurchase as I have a Glamcor and a Neewer that I purchased before I bought this one and both are really bright and are still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Abrams Family

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. I was looking for a light for my two sons to use to read by at night, but I didn’t want their nightstands cluttered. This is the perfect solution. It’s just the right height and has enough flexibility to be able to adjust for reading. The brightness is really good too, plus you just can’t beat the price. I bought two of these and will happily purchase more when I need reading lights for my other kids. It’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Great bright light w/ dimming; sturdy, attractive, great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp Just got it. Easy to assemble. Has wonderful light ! The best light in my living room . Also has dimming capacity. Very sturdy. ( I’ve had floor lamps that always tipped. ) Looks Great ( I got the “ natural ) can’t review “ energy efficiency .. I guess one can find that in the description. And a great price as well
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We use this lamp to light the area behind our high definition TV - dim setting, daylight works well - and to supply light for a nearby bookshelf - bright setting, white light is perfect. The gooseneck helps aim the light appropriately for these two uses. My only concern has been the thin power line but we haven't vacuumed it or otherwise damaged it yet. No hesitation in recommending it to anyone looking for an inexpensive, flexible floor lamp.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.Silver

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp in August. It was used sparingly and not every day. I don't even think it has 5 hours total on it in 4 months. I went to turn it on yesterday and it was dead. Would not turn on. NOT happy about this at all!! :(
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Follow-up Review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp a couple of years ago. It lasted about 6 months and quit working. I notified the seller and they sent me a replacement very quickly. The second lamp also went dead in about the same time frame. I have since purchased a lamp from a different vendor and it is working fine, so far. Time will tell. Conclusion. Brightech has great customer service but this particular lamp has some kind of issue that needs attention.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one night.  One!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine the evening we assembled it. The next night it wouldn’t turn on. The on/off button was the only thing that was lighted. Called their customer service number and got a recorded message to expect a 30 minute wait to speak to a representative. Sent an email, but from the sounds of other reviewers, we will probably have it returned before they respond. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp for sewing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp while sewing at the sewing machine. It has helped so much. I use this on one side, and another smaller lamp on the other side which prevents shadows. I free motion quilt on a regular sewing machine, so visibility is essential. I was having trouble with shadows before buying this lamp. I can even turn off my overhead light in the bedroom where I sew while hubby is sleeping.. It also looks great! I could not be more pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Brightech LED reading and craft floor light.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice lamp. The base is quite heavy, so it is unlikely to be knocked over easily. It is quite bright on high and pleasantly dim when turned down. The flexible neck could have a little more flexibility but as is, it is fine for reading. Ample height for having it above your shoulder when seated in your favorite recliner/sofa for me at least (5'9"). I like the illuminated switch and that it is on the lamp head rather than on the cord like another lamp I have. It's great for working at a table or bench for projects that need plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: Desert DogTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: The lamp did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Returning the lamp because the dimming feature did not work at all, I was advised by Brightech that there was an apparent technological problem with the lamp as follows: " I have consulted with our technical team and unfortunately it seems that this is likely a technical fault with the lamp and not something that can be easily fixed through sending out a replacement piece." I do want to mention that Brightech does have very good customer service and the packaging of the lamp was good. However because the lamp did not work once I assembled it, I will not reorder this lamp again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: It has a bright LED light, which is good. It took me awhile to figure out how to dim the light because it was not listed in the instructions. One problem that I noticed is that it has a tendency to fall down because the small screw at the base of the pole is inadequate and doesn't secure it properly. What I also noticed is that the switch glows at night. Some might like this feature, but I thought is was slightly annoying. I got used to it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Bright Lamp, Love the Gooseneck....
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace an old brass floor lamp. This is really great, the base is small enough to fit almost anywhere, easy to transport, and the gooseneck makes it really easy to get the light where you want it. I would like the lamp cord to be longer, but I can use an extension cord. It's very bright, not like a spotlight but a diffused easy brightness than covers a lot of area. (Some lamps I've had gave off a small light circle...)
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleek look
customer_reviews.text: Just as we expected them. Good heavy base to balance the tall pole. Flexible goose-neck sleeve, though a little loose appears to be required in the design. I put 3 of these in our living room for a nice sleek lighting look. I love the antique pharmacist floor lamps and this is a modern, less expensive version that makes it easy to re-position for reading or ambient lighting. I assemble all three in less than 40 minutes and most of that was removing all the packaging protecting each part. You do need at Phillips head screw driver for bottom set screw.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for my Mom who is 80 and having a little trouble seeing things clearly. It is a bright light and very flexible - exactly what she needed. Sometimes she wants to use it to see her hand-sewing and other times to put her puzzles together. It is perfect for both. Easy to put together and operate and is very flexible. The weighted base will prevent it from falling over easily but not too heavy so she will be able to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Skelton

customer_reviews.title: Cold white, harsh lighting
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok light. I don't understand why it is so highly reviewed. The design is somewhat unattractive, which I realized when I ordered it. It looks out of place in my living room. My main complaint, though, is the quality of the light itself. It is a very cold harsh white, white. It feels like I'm in some sort of institution with those horrible fluorescent lights. At least it is dimmable, which is a nice feature, but that kinds of defeats the purpose. I will keep it since it's too difficult to pack up and send back, but it's definitely not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp to fit in a corner of my living room where I do a lot of hand sewing at night while watching TV. It's so nice to have the light feature that sheds the perfect amount of light that you desire. Love the twistable head that gives enough light, but doesn't blind other people in the room. It's really like a true color light that shows the colors you are working on perfectly. I have just recently bought 2 more of these lamps. One for our bedroom and one for my outdoor craft room. What else can I say. I love these lamps!!!
customer_reviews.author: momofgus

customer_reviews.title: dim doesn't get low enough (not like incandescent ) and speaking of the limitations of LED ...
customer_reviews.text: Mechanically well made and the base is quite stable. Dimmability narrow in range, imo- bright is high, dim doesn't get low enough (not like incandescent ) and speaking of the limitations of LED lighting- the color or temperature (what am I a scientist?) is harsh and stark. Like fluorescent tubes in a hospital hallway. I'll keep it and use it, but the warm, low dim, pleasing ambience I wanted is nowhere to be found in this product. Sorry, just being honest.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, useful, serves its function.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp so I can see my handsewing, etc. It arrived promptly, and was easy to assemble (though ppl should take care with the delicate threading between sections of the pole-- could have gone awry there pretty easily.) The light works-- goes from quite bright to pleasantly dim. But the color of the light is very harsh/cold. Not a problem for my purposes, but there you go. Gooseneck seems to be the right balance of firm and flexible. Also, it's a very ugly lamp. Feels like it belongs in the dentist's office. But I knew that when I ordered it. so.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic light with great coverage!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd purchase and ready to purchase a 4th. I have one in my woodshop for detailed painting and two for sewing and quilting. Much, much better than an Ott light! I really like the new detailed light wood grain on the base. You can reduce the height like in my woodshop, or keep them at their actual height as I do next to my sewing machine or table for hand quilting. Can you make a barn wood design with the black metal? 🥰 I have owned these lights for over 10 years and can't really do detailed handwork or reading without the great lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light has been perfect. A diffuse and natural life that is very ...
customer_reviews.text: The light has been perfect. A diffuse and natural life that is very easy to read and work with and can be calibrated as you need.. The package came on time and was very compact. I was a bit worried about putting it together as I'm a klutz, but the instructions were clear and I built it in less than ten minutes and it works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: J. Patrick Dobel

customer_reviews.title: Great to use when putting together a puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Mom to use at her puzzle table and everyone who sees it says how much they like it. I would definitely recommend and am planning on buying one for myself! It’s very portable, easy to use, has a bright white light, and is flexible to fit most needs. With its LED light it should last many, many hours yet be very economical. I’m so glad I bought this, and best yet, Mom likes it too, which makes everyone happy!
customer_reviews.author: Todd A Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this lamp. Easy to put together, the neck is flexible, the base is heavy so it doesn't tip. It gives great light for working on paperwork in my recliner. :) And the brightness is adjustable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Nice product; good company
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these lamps. When it arrived, one of the metal screw-in parts of the pipes was broken. I contacted the company and someone help me right away - they shipped me a replacement part very fast. Now everything works fine and I love the lamp. It's a solid product, an excellent light for reading. It emits strong yet and not glary light. And I like that you can direct the light any way you like. The company provided excellent customer support as well. I'd buy again from Brightech. Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: corson50

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have made in years. During these long Winter months, my family and I have been putting together jigsaw puzzles. The poor lighting in the house made it difficult if not impossible to work on the puzzles at night time. Withe the Brightech Litespan LED Bright Reading and Craft Floor Lamp, our trouble are over. There is no glare and it is easy to select puzzle pieces. Thanks so much for inventing this lamp. I wish you continued successes! Regards, Terry Houghtaling
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but switch is not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, fits in with my colonial decor. Bright light is perfect for my work. Switch is unreliable and does not always work, so am leaving it on, and will use the wall plug to turn it off instead of using the switch. Assemble carefully, because the white plug just at the base tends to come apart. Test to be sure light works before assembling and follow the instructions exactly so the plug does not come apart accidentally. I may return it because the price is too high for something that is beautiful but fickle. I'll try exchanging it.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: This light really is as great as everyone says it is which is the reason ...
customer_reviews.text: This light really is as great as everyone says it is which is the reason we bought this light in the first place. The light that comes out of this lamp is magnificent. We got the design of: black pole with the unfinished wood base and light. This looks great. It does not look cheap. It was easy for me, a female, to put this together. The instructions need to be more clear about the fact that the light can be adjusted from full lighting to dimmer lighting. This can be done by holding down the button that turns on the light for a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Sinsin

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another one
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two. One for reading and one for knitting. Yes the arm is shorter than most, however, I just move it closer to me. I also eliminated the middle section to make them shorter. The one I use for reading fits perfectly over the recliner arm and can be adjusted towards the book or kindle and not shine in my eyes. The dimmer is wonderful. The on/off switch glows very dimly in the dark so you know where the switch is. I can make the amount of light to my liking. It is nice and bright for my knitting. I can shine it right on my work. I had looked forever for something that worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Here I am again

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product - two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product - I love it so much I bought a second one for my vacation home! The product was delivered on time, as promised, packaged well, and assembly was simple. One of the features I like is the ability to easily move the head and dim it to create various lighting conditions. When I'm reading or doing detailed work it's pointed down and away. When I want indirect lighting I point the head toward the wall or ceiling. This looks like a well built and durable product that will stand the test of time - I can't say that about many products these days. The price is right as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: R Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: This product delivers what it say.  See below.
customer_reviews.text: I got this light for doing crafts and puzzles. I looked at many of the competitors, and I was convinced that this was the one for me. You can move it wherever you need it and it stays put, you can change the level of light so easily, and the light comes from a big enough area that it cuts way down on glare. It is sleek in appearance, and really easy to assemble from the package. I am planning on ordering another one for the first floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lida Rose

customer_reviews.title: Bought a Second One
customer_reviews.text: These are great lamps - just bought a second one after about a year. The first one sits by my reading/needleworking chair and the second is next to my piano keyboard. As soon as I got the first one, I noticed a decrease in eyestrain while working and reading in the evening. (Previously had an old Verilux) I also love the dimmer and that it remembers the previous setting. The lamps are attractive, as well. It's not hard to assemble if you read and follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: I use this lamp all the time and has worked ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp all the time and has worked well for me. I have had no problems with the lamp. I even bought a second one for my 105-year old father-in-law. We both like this lamp very much.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: It took only 10-15 minutes to assemble; simply screw the pole segments together. Only the base portion is somewhat tricky. Screw the silver part onto the base unit first, then push down the pole making sure the screw holes line up. Lamp takes up minimal space but yet fairly steady due to its metal base and pole. It is bright (adjustable by holding down on the power button) enough for reading. Now, let's just hope it lasts 2 or 3 years!
customer_reviews.author: groundie

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent light and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent light and I highly recommend it. I use it for estimating jobs on a drafting table. It makes everything very easy to see and read. Extremely easy to assemble and I love how it can dim.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use while doing needlepoint in my living room. My lighting is not great for detail work so I needed something different. A friend recommended this lamp and it’s perfect. Since it’s LED, there is no heat given off while using it. Now I’m using it for reading as well - I didn’t realize how much I was squinting and straining my eyes while trying to read. It’s extremely easy to put together too and I’m not particularly handy or good putting things together. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: (maybe we shouldn't expect more from that price range) --hopefully this one will be better.. This is progress in the lighting industry
customer_reviews.text: LED's are the way to go at this time, and this lamp and desk lamp are examples.. it is impressive how much light they put out, and in the case of the desk lamp, the ability to change color, though whether we need this ability is questionable.The floor lamp construction( shaky post, plastic corrugated arm cover, with becomes , with time, brittle,) is similar to other types of floor lamps, and doesn't hold up well in the world of daylight output lamps, quartz and others of the same price bracket, (maybe we shouldn't expect more from that price range) --hopefully this one will be better.. This is progress in the lighting industry, sometimes progress is positive.
customer_reviews.author: ronald a dierwechter

customer_reviews.title: Big upgrade from prior desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an Ott floor lamp that finally burned out and the replacement bulb is no longer available anywhere. I like that this product had more than one color option and that the LEDs are integral and will not need replacement--their 20,000 hour lifetime span seems entirely sufficient. The base is smaller than the Ott lamp so it fits closer to the side of my desk. The only thing that I'd change is the gooseneck bend which isn't low enough on the shaft to reach into the middle of my desk. Otherwise it's a five star!
customer_reviews.author: LightPixie

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: I am a tattoo artist and I just started working at a new shop in a new state. The lighting there was not efficient enough to be able to see what I was doing clearly. The owner of the shop had a floor lamp similar to this for me to use but even it was only a little better than the overhead lighting so I bought this one. It is very bright and makes my job so much easier as well as that of the staff photographer when she's taking photos of the finished product! It is light weight and the flexible neck helps you direct the light right where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Dessa P. Blackthorn

customer_reviews.title: Best In Class! Superb Light!!
customer_reviews.text: Every so often you come across a product that is head and shoulders above the competition. This Brightech Lifespan LED Reading Floor Lamp is in this category. LED lights last for an almost indefinite length of time, take up less electricity, and give off a nice glow for maximum reading comfort. The intensity on this light is more than sufficient. Way more. If you find the light too bright, all you need due is tilt the LED head away from you. I spend many hours on my Kindle every day. This light is perfect for ereading! It also looks fashionable, and is super easy to assemble. Enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful light for reading!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. That is, I've read reviews on other lights that seem to be of a similar design (large LED light that can be angled and dimmed to suit the reader) but didn't last very long. I've only had this light for a few days, but I love it. Reading in my favorite chair just improved 100%. The assembly and set up were easy, and the light works just as advertised. Should any problems occur, I will edit this review. But so far, this appears to be an excellent product. And if Booklovers.com likes it, that is a pretty good endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: P. Matychuk

customer_reviews.title: Love our Brightech floor lamps!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Brightech floor lamps! My husband and I bought one. Loved it! Bought another! We chose the Havana Brown - very beautiful! They illuminate the respective reading areas in our living room without being obtrusive. They give warm light that helps me to see the smallest font! It took us forever to decide on lighting. We have a cathedral ceiling and didn't want to block it in any way. These floor lamps were the perfect choice. Also, I love that the base is really solid and also has the quick release plug in case you need it. These lamps do it for us - form and function! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: CaroltheMac

customer_reviews.title: I found the Brightech LED floor lamp easy to assemble and I like the dimming feature
customer_reviews.text: I found the Brightech LED floor lamp easy to assemble and I like the dimming feature. The illuminated switch makes it easy to find in the dark. The base is heavy enough to keep it steady. Plus, I will not have to worry about bulb replacement for many years. Overall, I'm pleased with this product. P.B. in Seattle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would order again
customer_reviews.text: Purchased lamp for my elderly father. My dad has a hard time turning buttons, the button for on and off is easy to reach from a sitting postion no button to turn or chain to pull ! Just touch the button. It is very bright. My parents like this lamp so much my mom who is 105 had me order a second lamp. I specifically ordered this product because of the function of the on off button.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Shimel

product_meta.title: Brightech Litespan - Bright LED Floor Lamp for Crafts & Reading - Estheticians' Light for Lash Extensions - Natural Daylight Lighting for Office Tasks - Adjustable Gooseneck Pole Lamp - Black
feature_bullets: HIGH BRIGHTNESS & HIGH CONTRAST LIGHT FOR READING BOOKS & CRAFTING - Need a lamp with high intensity light that also shows you fine color contrast for hobbies such as sewing, knitting and puzzles, or to read fine print? Look no further. The Litespan shines a bright 850-950 lumens - yet only draws 12W of electricity.

NATURAL DAYLIGHT ESTHETICIAN'S LAMP FOR EYELASH EXTENSIONS, MAKEUP & MORE BEAUTY SPA & SALON SERVICES - See your clients' lashes very clearly and in high contrast/precision with the Brightech Litespan standing lamp's natural daylight color light (6000K color temperature). Get the lash extensions on just right, fast, so your next clients' wait is shorter.

MODERN OFFICE FLOOR LAMP FOR YOUR DESK OR ARMCHAIR WITH ADJUSTABLE GOOSENECK - Carry out your work easily without installing expensive overhead lights. Adjust the gooseneck (aka the arm) to point the light right where you need it, e.g. on your desk. This amplifies the light perceived by your eye, as opposed to e.g. a bright ceiling-mounted light whose light is dispersed over the whole room.

STURDY AND SAFE, USEFUL POLE LAMP FOR KIDS ROOMS: The Litespan’s weighted, high-stability base ensures that no one, including kids or pets will knock it over easily. The LEDs remain cool to the touch even after hours of use which avoids accidental brush-burns and overheating your space. The soft night light setting gives off an orange glow which will gently light your way in the dark to keep you safe at night.

BRIGHTECH'S 3 YEAR PRODUCT WARRANTY: We proudly stand behind all of our products 100%, which is why we offer a full 3 year warranty. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us because our number one goal is customer satisfaction and we are committed to making it right for you. Applies to products bought from Brightech (not just Brightech branded) in new condition.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars11,099 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
